name: regional averages
desc: Average nodal data values from the input field that fall into the input regions.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Z Position
properties.desc: The Z Position allows the user to set the vertical position of the regional average output points.

properties.name: Radius
properties.desc: The Radius field sets the radius of the renderable output spheres.

properties.name: Regional ID Component
properties.desc: The Regional ID Component selects which cell data component from the polygon regions input should be used to identify each region.

properties.name: Data For Visualization
properties.desc: The Data for Visualization parameter selects which nodal data component from the input field to color the output spheres by.
